i1.name: Sovereign's_Domination
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Viego''' scores a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy {{tip|champion}} while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, a ''Mist Wraith'' spawns from that champion's corpse for 8 seconds, disappearing prematurely when he dies. '''Viego''' can basic attack a champion's ''Mist Wraith'' to ''possess'' it, {{tip|heal}} himself for {{as|{{fd|2.5}}%|health}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{as|of the target's '''maximum''' health}}, and {{tip|blink}} to its location after winding up for 1 second, during which he is {{tip|untargetable}} (except to {{tip|turrets}}) and {{tip|lockout|unable to act}}.

''Possession'' lasts for 10 seconds and replaces '''Viego's''' [[basic attack]]s, [[champion ability|basic abilities]], [[item]]s, base [[champion statistic|stats]] (based on '''Viego's''' [[Experience (champion)|level]]), and appearance with the champion who spawned the ''Mist Wraith''. '''Viego''' also gains a free cast of {{ai|Heartbreaker|Viego}}, which is initially placed on a {{fd|1.5}}-second {{sti|cooldown}}, and {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while moving toward enemy champions within 2500 units during this time.

'''Viego''' cannot use [[active ability items|item actives]], [[consumable item]]s, nor the [[shop]] while under ''possession''. Casting {{ai|Heartbreaker|Viego}} or attacking a ''Mist Wraith'' ends ''possession'' prematurely.
'''''Viego''' will preserve his {{as|'''current''' health percentage}} between transformations.''
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Whenever Viego scores a takedown against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, a Mist Wraith spawns from that champion's corpse for 8 seconds, disappearing prematurely when he dies. Viego can basic attack a champion's Mist Wraith to possess it, heal himself for 2.5% (+ 2.5% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 2% per 100 AP) (+ 5% per 100% bonus attack speed) of the target's maximum health, and blink to its location after winding up for 1 second, during which he is untargetable (except to turrets) and unable to act.
Possession lasts for 10 seconds and replaces Viego's basic attacks, champion ability, items, base champion statistic (based on Viego's Experience (champion)), and appearance with the champion who spawned the Mist Wraith. Viego also gains a free cast of Viego's Heartbreaker, which is initially placed on a 1.5-second cooldown, and 10% bonus movement speed while moving toward enemy champions within 2500 units during this time.
Viego cannot use active ability items, consumable items, nor the shop while under possession. Casting Viego's Heartbreaker or attacking a Mist Wraith ends possession prematurely.
Viego will preserve his current health percentage between transformations.
i1.notes:
* '''Viego''' will copy the possessed champion's ability ranks.
** '''Viego''' cannot level up their abilities with his available skill points.
* ''Mist Wraiths'' will not expire while '''Viego''' is winding up on them.
* '''Viego''' gains the bonus movement speed during possession even while moving towards nearby enemy champions that are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* Finishing the possessing attack against a ''Mist Wraith'' kills it, rewarding '''Viego''' an extra {{g|3}} as he becomes the target champion.
* The wind up's {{tip|untargetability}} does not {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroy}} in-flight {{tip|projectiles}} from {{tip|turret|turrets}}.
* The possessed champion's abilities do not cost any {{tip|mana}} or {{tip|energy}} even if that specific champion normally uses either as a [[casting resource]].
** [[Manaless#Alternative_gating_mechanics|Alternative resources]], such as {{tip|Fury}}, {{tip|Flow}}, or {{tip|Health resource|Health}}, will still be utilized.
* The current cooldowns of '''Viego's''' abilities will '''not''' be reset between transformations.
** Those of the possessed champion's abilities will be reset between transformations.
* The passive cooldowns of items are shared between '''Viego's''' and the possessed champion's.
** This does not apply to {{nie|Lifeline}} items.{{bug|2}}
* Once ''possession'' ends, '''Viego''' returns to his normal state and certain effects gained from the possessed champion's abilities will be immediately removed.
** Some buffs will be kept and some buffs will be lost.
*** '''Viego''' will almost always keep {{tip|shield|shields}} and {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}}.
*** [[Passive]] effects will be lost by default, as '''Viego''' no longer has their abilities.
** {{tip|Channel|Channeled abilities}} maintained will be interrupted.
** [[Champion ability|Toggled abilities]] will be automatically toggled off.
* '''Viego''' retains his own [[summoner spell]]s, [[trinket item]], and [[rune]]s during ''possession''.
* ''Mist Wraiths'' will still spawn while '''Viego''' is in a zombie state.
* ''Sovereign's Domination'' will not summon a ''Mist Wraith'' from {{tip|clone|clones}}.
* The ''possession'' will not expire while '''Viego''' is in a {{tip|zombie state}}.
** While in a zombie state, {{ai|Heartbreaker|Viego}} is disabled.
** If '''Viego''' enters a zombie state while winding up on a ''Mist Wraith'', the possession will still last its normal duration.{{bug|2}}
* The ''possession'' will not end prematurely if '''Viego''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* The ''possession'' will acquire the basic abilities of shapeshifting champions (e.g. {{cai|Spider Form / Human Form|Elise}}, {{cai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce}} / {{ai|Transform Mercury Hammer|Jayce}}, and {{cai|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee}}) based on which form they died as.
* ''Mist Wraiths'' are considered {{tip|clone|clones}} and can only be targeted by '''Viego'''.
* If '''Viego''' possesses an enemy champion who owns {{ii|Dark Seal}} or {{ii|Mejai's Soulstealer}}, he will gain their {{nie|Glory}} stacks for the possession.
* As {{ii|Cull}} tracks its progress for each player even if they do not possess the item at the time, '''Viego''' may discharge stacks for the benefit of {{g|1}} each per {{tip|minion}} kill, and if '''Viego''' killed 100 minions possessing {{ii|Cull}}, no matter whether bought himself or acquired via a possessed champion's inventory, he receives the {{g|350}} payout and can no longer discharge stacks. 
** This entire interaction does not interact with the state of the {{ii|Cull}} stacks of the enemy.
** The stacks shown on the item in the inventory and scoreboard may not update properly, however.
* If '''Viego''' possesses an enemy champion who owns {{ii|Relic Shield}}, {{ii|Steel Shoulderguards}}, {{ii|Spellthief's Edge}}, or {{ii|Spectral Sickle}}, the gold gained from using any one of the items will also count towards '''Viego's''' own [[Named item effect#Quest|Quest]].
* If '''Viego''' possesses an enemy champion who owns {{ii|Tear of the Goddess}}, the stacks it has will be transferred to his {{ii|Tear of the Goddess}} if he owns one.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Viego''' is winding up on a ''Mist Wraith'':
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,false,false,false,false|interrupts=death}}

q1.name: Blade_of_the_Ruined_King
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Viego's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}. The '''bonus''' damage has a minimum threshold and is capped at 80 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

Additionally, damaging [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a mark to enemies for 4 seconds. '''Viego's''' next basic attack against a marked target consumes the mark {{tip|on-hit}} to strike twice, with the second strike dealing {{tt|{{as|20% AD}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Scales on current AD and AP}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|heal|healing}} him for 135% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt, increased to 144% against monsters and reduced to 10% against {{tip|minions}}.

The second strike can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|35% (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}} 7%) AD}} {{as|(+ 26.25% (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}} 5.25%) AP)}} {{as|physical damage}} and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Viego''' thrusts his blade in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|formula=1 × critical strike chance}}|critical chance}}, and {{as|20 '''bonus''' physical damage}} against monsters.

''Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under {{ai|Sovereign's Domination|Viego|possession}}, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to '''bonus''' damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} (based on possessed stats).''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Viego's basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit. The bonus damage has a minimum threshold and is capped at 80 against monsters.
Additionally, damaging champion ability apply a mark to enemies for 4 seconds. Viego's next basic attack against a marked target consumes the mark on-hit to strike twice, with the second strike dealing 20% AD (+ 15% AP) physical damage and healing him for 135% of the post-mitigation damage dealt, increased to 144% against monsters and reduced to 10% against minions.
The second strike can critically strike for 35% (+Infinity Edge 7%) AD (+ 26.25% (+Infinity Edge 5.25%) AP) physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Active: Viego thrusts his blade in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined, and 20 bonus physical damage against monsters.
Blade of the Ruined King's passive remains under Viego's possession, and while transformed, the second strike is instead converted to bonus damage on-hit which no longer applies on-hit effects but can still critically strike (based on possessed stats).
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|2 to 6}}% of target's '''current''' health}}}}
{{st|Minimum Bonus Damage|{{ap|10 to 30}}}}

{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 75}} {{as|(+ 70% AD)}}
{{times}}{{as|(1 + {{critical damage|100|0}} critical strike chance)|critical chance}}|Physical Damage to Monsters|{{ap|15 to 75}} {{as|(+ 70% AD)}}
{{times}}{{as|(1 + {{critical damage|100|0}} critical strike chance)|critical chance}} {{plus}} 20}}
q1.notes:
* The mark will not be applied to the primary target struck by {{ai|Heartbreaker|Viego}}, but it can triggered from it.
* ''Blade of the Ruined King's'' cast time is always 140% of the caster's attack windup time.
** At base attack speed, '''Viego's''' attack windup is {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
** An easy formula to calculate the cast time is [ {{fd|0.23}} seconds divided by {{as|'''total''' attack speed|attack speed}} ].
** Reducing '''Viego's''' attack speed via {{tip|cripple|attack speed reductions}} also increases ''Blade of the Ruined King's'' cast time by the same fraction.
** It is calculated from '''Viego's''' total attack speed after cap (2.5) and floor (0.2), making the maximum possible cast time {{rutngt|1.152}}.
** ''Blade of the Ruined King's'' cast time becomes the same as the standard {{rutngt|0.25}} cast time for most abilities at {{as|{{fd|32.6}}% '''bonus''' attack speed|attack speed}}.
<!-- todo: table? -->
* Applies {{tip|area damage}} for the thrust and {{tip|proc damage}} for the bonus damage on-hit and second strike.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* '''Viego''' will not perform the second strike if the first attack was {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked|blocked}}, and {{tip|blind|missed}}.
* The second strike rolls {{tip|critical strike}} independently from the triggering attack.
* If the second strike hits a dead unit, '''Viego''' will still {{tip|heal}} based on the post-mitigation damage that he would deal with it.
* The attacks do not deal the '''bonus''' damage against [[structures]].

    ×(1 + (+ IE 25%) critical strike chance)

w1.name: Spectral_Maw
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viego''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 10% for up to 3 seconds to increase ''Spectral Maw's'' mist missile {{sti|range}} and {{tip|stun}} duration over the first second of the channel. ''Spectral Maw'' can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, ''Spectral Maw'' is canceled and goes on full cooldown.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Viego''' hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy struck and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for {{pp|type=channel time|0.25 to 1.25 for 5|0 to 1|formula=0.25 + (0.25 per 0.25 seconds channeled).|changedisplay = true}} seconds.
If the charge is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, ''Spectral Maw'' resumes a {{tt|reduced|If the cooldown is already below 3 seconds, this has no effect}} 3-second static <br/ >{{sti|cooldown}}.
''Spectral Maw'' {{tip|Basic attack reset|resets}} '''Viego's''' basic attack timer.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viego charges while being slowed by 10% for up to 3 seconds to increase Spectral Maw's mist missile range and stun duration over the first second of the channel. Spectral Maw can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Spectral Maw is canceled and goes on full cooldown.
Recast: Viego hurls a blast of mist in the target direction and dashes a fixed distance in the same direction, though not through terrain. The mist deals magic damage to the first enemy struck and stuns them for 0 to 1 ‒ undefined seconds.
If the charge is interrupted, Spectral Maw resumes a reduced 3-second static
cooldown.
Spectral Maw resets Viego's basic attack timer.
w1.notes:
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Viego''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack=false|move=true|cast={{ai|Harrowed Path|Viego}} is usable. {{ai|Blade of the Ruined King|Viego}} and {{ai|Heartbreaker|Viego}} are disabled.|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets.|spells=true, true, false, false, recasts|interrupts=death, silence, ground, root}}

e1.name: Harrowed_Path
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viego''' sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist along its path which lasts 8 seconds. The mist spreads around the first instance of [[terrain]] encountered.

While inside the mist, '''Viego''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and, if he is not attacking or casting, he becomes {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} and gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the camouflage and remove the {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}, preventing '''Viego''' from gaining them again for 1 second, reduced to {{fd|0.6}} seconds if he recasted {{ai|Spectral Maw|Viego}} and increased to 2 seconds if he attacked a {{tip|monster}}. This duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and ability casts.
''Harrowed Path'' can be cast during any of '''Viego's''' abilities.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viego sends a spectre in the target direction that creates a trail of mist along its path which lasts 8 seconds. The mist spreads around the first instance of terrain encountered.
While inside the mist, Viego gains bonus attack speed and, if he is not attacking or casting, he becomes camouflaged and gains bonus movement speed.
Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the camouflage and remove the bonus movement speed, preventing Viego from gaining them again for 1 second, reduced to 0.6 seconds if he recasted Viego's Spectral Maw and increased to 2 seconds if he attacked a monster. This duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and ability casts.
Harrowed Path can be cast during any of Viego's abilities.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|25 to 35}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* The bonus movement speed and camouflage are granted by the same buff.
* '''Viego''' will enter camouflage even while {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.
* '''Viego''' can cast ''Harrowed Path'' during the cast time of any ability or spell.
* Ranking up ''Harrowed Path'' while the effect is already active will still immediately improve the bonuses it grants.
* ''Harrowed Path'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|14 to 6}}|Starts when the mist expires after 8 seconds}}' as '14/12/10/8/6/8' and riot's value '14,12,10,8,6' as '14/12/10/8/6'

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 4% per 100 AP)

r1.name: Heartbreaker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viego''' discards his current {{ai|Sovereign's Domination|Viego|possession}} if he has one and gains {{tip|displacement immunity}} over the cast time, then {{tip|blink|blinks}} to the target location.

Upon arrival, '''Viego''' creates a blast that deals {{as|120% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|formula=1 × critical strike chance}}|critical chance}}, and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} all but one up-to 400 units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.

The {{tt|most wounded|Lowest health percent}} enemy champion, {{tt|alternatively the closest one|if all targets have the same percent health}}, is not knocked back and instead takes the blow from '''Viego's''' blade, which deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 99% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.

''If a {{ai|Sovereign's Domination|Viego|possession}} is discarded, Heartbreaker will be placed on a {{fd|1.5}}-second cooldown if it is not already on cooldown. Heartbreaker will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viego discards his current Viego's possession if he has one and gains displacement immunity over the cast time, then blinks to the target location.
Upon arrival, Viego creates a blast that deals 120% AD physical damage to all nearby enemies, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined, and knocks back all but one up-to 400 units away based on proximity, though not through terrain.
The most wounded enemy champion, alternatively the closest one, is not knocked back and instead takes the blow from Viego's blade, which deals bonus physical damage, slows them by 99% for 0.25 seconds, and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
If a Viego's possession is discarded, Heartbreaker will be placed on a 1.5-second cooldown if it is not already on cooldown. Heartbreaker will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|15 to 25}}% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''missing''' health}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Heartbreaker'' will cast at the edge of its range if the target location is further beyond.
* ''Heartbreaker'' will cast at maximum range from the end of {{ais|Spectral Maw|Viego}} dash if it is cast during the dash.
* The knockback speed is 1000 units per second. The airborne is removed as soon as the displacement ends.
** The maximum airborne duration is therefore {{fd|0.4}} seconds. The minimum is {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the struck champion and {{tip|area damage}} to all other enemies.
* '''Viego''' will enter a {{fd|0.25}}-second [[cast time]] if he strikes an enemy champion.
* ''Heartbreaker's'' strike to the champion can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} and {{tip|block|blocked}}, but not {{tip|blind|missed}}.
* '''Viego''' will be ordered to [[basic attack]] the primary target afterwards.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: % (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) of target's missing health

st_slices: % (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) of target's missing health
